SEARCH

Package Presentation

package Presentation
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddAlphabetView
    The AddAlphabetView class is responsible for managing the view to add a new alphabet in the presentation layer.
    AddKeyboardView
    The AddKeyboardView class represents a view for adding a new keyboard.
    AddTextView
    The AddTextView class represents the view for adding a text matrix to the specified alphabet in the transition controller.
    AddWordFrequencyListView
    The AddWordFrequencyListView class represents the view for adding a word frequency list matrix to the specified alphabet in the transition controller.
    AlphabetListView
    The AlphabetListView class is responsible for managing the alphabet list view in the presentation layer.
    DeleteAlphabetView
    The DeleteAlphabetView class is responsible for managing the view to delete an alphabet in the presentation layer.
    DeleteKeyboardView
    The DeleteKeyboardView class represents a view for deleting an existing keyboard.
    DeleteTransitionView
    The DeleteTransitionView class represents the view for deleting a transition matrix from the transition controller.
    DisplayKeyboardView
    The `DisplayKeyboardView` class represents a view for displaying the distribution of characters on a keyboard and allows users to interact with it.
    Error
    The `Error` class represents a simple error message panel.
    EvaluationView
    The `EvaluationView` class is responsible for managing the keyboard evaluation view in the presentation layer.
    InputView
    The InputView class is responsible for managing the main input view in the presentation layer.
    InputViewController
    The InputViewController class is responsible for managing the input view in the presentation layer.
    KeyboardList
    The `KeyboardList` class represents a view for displaying a list of keyboards, allowing users to interact with keyboard entries, add new keyboards, and delete existing ones.
    Main
    The Main class serves as the entry point for the application.
    MainViewController
    The MainViewController class is responsible for managing the main display frame and interacting with the PresentationController to handle user input and actions.
    MenuView
    The MenuView class represents a view for the main menu of the application.
    OperationCorrect
    The OperationCorrect class represents a simple panel indicating a successful operation.
    PresentationController
    The PresentationController class is responsible for managing the presentation layer of the application.
    TransitionViewController
    The TransitionViewController class is responsible for managing transitions in the presentation layer.
    TransView
    The TransView class is responsible for managing the transition matrix view in the presentation layer.
